This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Frances E. Quebbeman was a Navy nurse and director of nursing at the Great Lakes Naval Training Station Hospital. Photocopy of typescript of original draft. Based on the author's Ph.D. dissertation, University of Arizona, 1966.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Medicine in Territorial Arizona (AZ 118). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Navy nurse; director of nursing at the Great Lakes Naval Training Station Hospital.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in narrative sequence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of typescript of original draft. Based on the author's Ph.D. dissertation, University of Arizona, 1966.

relatedmaterial.p: Published in 1966 by the Arizona Historical Foundation.
